availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel L. Jenkins (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Filed a bond of marriage to Mary Jane Pirkle Jenkins in Princeton, Kentucky, on December 12, 1853. Father of David F. Jenkins, America F. Jenkins, T. John Jenkins, and Samuel Jenkins. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 3.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 1, p. 7B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000546372, p. 123.
"Samuel L. Jenkins (1819-1903)," Find A Grave, Memorial #46232735, accessed April 20, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/46232735.
